entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Haines Junction
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:45 AM MST Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Haines Junction 12:00 PM MST Thursday 16 March 2023
Temperature: -9.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: -11.5°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 4 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:43 AM MST Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:43 AM MST Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon then 30 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:43 AM MST Thursday 16 March 2023
